unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.content: The Translations Manager is reserved for admins only. You currently do not have the right access.

logged-out.title: You are logged out
logged-out.subtitle: This area is off-limits
logged-out.content: To use the Translations Manager you need to login.

import-dialog.title: Import Translations from File
import-dialog.content: Note: by saving you are overwriting the current version.

new-dialog.title: Add Translation for {{name}}
new-dialog.content: Language and Environment can either be existing or new. If both language and environment already exist, this will create a new version on top of the existing one.
new-dialog.new-lang: The language {{lang}} will be created.
new-dialog.new-env: The environment {{env}} will be created.
new-dialog.new-env-and-lang: The language {{lang}} and the environment {{env}} will be created.
new-dialog.new-version: A new version will be created for language {{lang}} and environment {{env}}.
new-dialog.env-invalid: Can only contain letters, numbers and dashes.

errors.pattern: Only letters, characters and dashes are allowed.
Only letters, characters and dashes are allowed.

confirm-reset.content: This will reset all unsaved changed. Are you sure?

projects.title: Project Overview
projects.no-results-content:
Your search didn't return any results. Try to broaden your search.

Tip: Searching for name will only match on the beginning of the name.

details.title: Project Details:
details.deleted-content: This project is not active. To restore this project, click the button.
details.translations-content: Note on versions: Newer versions are always 'merged' with older ones of the same environment and language.

delete-confirm.content: Are you sure you want to delete {{ name }}?

dialog.content-new: Project name should be a url friendly name. No spaces or symbols. Only letters, numbers and dashes (-) allowed.
dialog.content-edit: Warning: Updating project name can cause existing configurations to stop working. Only update if you know what you are doing.
dialog.env-invalid: Name can only contain letters, numbers and dashes
dialog.name: Project Name
dialog.pattern: Name can only contain letters, numbers and dashes
